summary.title: Summary
summary.intro: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in frontend and web applications. Experience in building, scaling, and maintaining modern web products in commercial and startup environments. Deep expertise in React and the JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem, with hands-on full-cycle development experience including backend services and AI-assisted features. Product-oriented and highly experienced in Agile delivery (Scrum, Kanban).

items.label: Frontend / JavaScript
details: Expert-level understanding of core JavaScript (ES6+), asynchronous programming, event loop, browser APIs, and performance optimization. Strong TypeScript expertise. Hands-on experience with complex DOM manipulation and cross-browser compatibility

items.label: Backend
details: REST API design and client-server communication. Experience with third-party integrations and authentication flows. Frameworks: Django, Next.js (API routes), Laravel

items.label: Frameworks
details: Strong module and application architecture expertise. Cross-platform development experience for mobile and desktop (React Native, Electron)

items.label: Markup & Styling
details: Expert knowledge of HTML and CSS. Cross-browser and cross-platform practices. Experience with modern style methodologies, preprocessors/postprocessors, and integration with JavaScript frameworks

items.label: Engineering Practices
details: OOP, Functional and Reactive programming paradigms. MV* architectures, common design patterns, and SOLID principles.

workHistory.description: Developed applications focused on virtual machines. Designed and implemented solutions using microfrontend architecture with Module Federation technologies.
Led a team building blockchain-related applications for cryptocurrency operations. Managed creation and maintenance of crypto platforms and integrations.
Built complex security-focused solutions, desktop applications, and browser extensions. Owned application development and long-term maintenance.
Developed high-load web applications from scratch as an outsourcing developer. Supported ongoing projects and collaborated with cross-functional teams.
Created user-friendly marketing interfaces and later worked on R&D initiatives: prototyping, researching new technologies, and delivering innovative solutions.
Focused on large-scale commercial projects and e-commerce websites, including adaptive mobile applications.
Converted design mockups into clean HTML/CSS/JS code. Produced web layouts, promo materials, and logos.
Built data extraction agents, performed transformation/cleaning, and loaded results into SQL databases using ETL frameworks.

education.institution: Petro Mohyla Black Sea State University

achievements.title: Ukrainian Web Challenge IX Finalist
achievements.description: Finalist in the Frontend Developer nomination.
